gameDetails.name: Sheriff of Nottingham: Dice Tower 2017 Indiegogo Promo Pack
gameDetails.description:
2 promo cards (Royal Pardon and Royal Jewels) which were available as a reward for the 2017 Dice Tower Season 13 Indiegogo fundraising campaign.

Royal Pardon: If your bag is inspected while Royal Pardon is in your bag, you are immune to penalties this round.

Royal Jewels: If the Sheriff inspects your bag, he may choose to keep this card.  If he does, you pay no penalties and treat the rest of your bag as though it was not inspected.
